data.name: config_Boss
data.value: Boss attack spoofing detection

data.name: config_ChatReal
data.value: Detects when a player attempts to spoof their name as another player's.

data.name: config_DespawnItem
data.value: Detects when items are unusually destroyed or deleted.

data.name: config_Enemy
data.value: Detects when a monster behaves abnormally.

data.name: config_FreeBuy
data.value: Detects players ordering items without spending credits.

data.name: config_Gift
data.value: Detects players having abnormal gift box interactions.

data.name: config_GrabObject
data.value: Detects picking up items outside of default grab range.

data.name: config_InfiniteAmmo
data.value: Detects when a player has infinite ammo. Note: If a shotgun has already been given infinite ammo, a normal player using it may cause them to be detected as using infinite ammo as well.

data.name: config_Invisibility
data.value: Detects invisible players.

data.name: config_ItemCooldown
data.value: Detects when a player uses an item faster than they should.

data.name: config_Jetpack
data.value: Detects when a player forces a jetpack explosion.

data.name: config_Kick
data.value: Kick player when this behavior is detected.

data.name: config_KillEnemy
data.value: Detects when an enemy is instantly killed.

data.name: config_Landmine
data.value: Detects when a player abnormally detonates a landmine.

data.name: config_Log
data.value: Show log

data.name: config_Map
data.value: Detects the use of mini-map mods.

data.name: config_Mask
data.value: Detects when masked enemies are spawned abnormally.

data.name: config_Nameless
data.value: Detects invalid or anomalous player names such as Nameless or Unknown.

data.name: config_Prefix
data.value: Puts text in square brackets before the lobby name, leave empty to disable.

data.name: config_RemoteTerminal
data.value: Detects when a player uses the terminal remotely.

data.name: config_ShipBuild
data.value: Detects the abnormal placement of furniture.

data.name: config_ShipConfig2
data.value: Clients can only pull the lever when this player count is reached. (StartGameOnlyHost must be set to false.)

data.name: config_ShipConfig3
data.value: Clients can take off after this in-game time.

data.name: config_ShipConfig4
data.value: Clients can take off when the number of living players in the ship is equal or greater than the specified percentage. (0-100%)

data.name: config_ShipConfig5
data.value: Detects when a player attempts to force the ship lever. Kicks the player if detected.

data.name: config_ShipConfig6
data.value: Allow your single vote to instantly force the autopilot as host.

data.name: config_ShipLight
data.value: Detects when a player switches the lights too fast.

data.name: config_ShipSetting
data.value: Only the host may land the ship.

data.name: config_ShipTerminal
data.value: Detects the spam of terminal noise.

data.name: config_Shovel
data.value: Detects unusual shovel damage.

data.name: config_Shovel2
data.value: Allow players to deal normal damage when empty-handed. Note: Network delays may cause players to be empty-handed.

data.name: config_SpawnWebTrap
data.value: Detects when a player tries to spawn spiderwebs.

data.name: config_Turret
data.value: Detects when a player forces a turret to spin.

data.name: Item_Shotgun
data.value: shotgun

data.name: Item_Shovel
data.value: shovel

data.name: log_load
data.value: AntiCheat mod are Loaded!

data.name: log_refuse_connect
data.value: {steamId} attempted to connect to the game but was rejected! (Already kicked)

data.name: MessageFormat
data.value: <color=red>{Prefix} {msg}</color>

data.name: msg_behind_player
data.value: <color=yellow>[{player}] <color=red>was left behind.</color></color>

data.name: msg_Boss
data.value: Detected player {player} attempting to call the boss attacking code functions!

data.name: msg_ChatReal
data.value: {player} tried to spoof {player2}'s name in chat!

data.name: msg_DespawnItem
data.value: {player} was detected destroying items!

data.name: msg_Enemy_ChangeOwnershipOfEnemy
data.value: {player} was detected trying to control a monster!

data.name: msg_Enemy_SwitchToBehaviour
data.value: {player} was detected trying to alter a monster's behavior!

data.name: msg_FreeBuy_Item
data.value: {player} was detected buying an item for free!

data.name: msg_FreeBuy_Level
data.value: {player} was detected routing to a priced moon for free!

data.name: msg_FreeBuy_SetMoney
data.value: {player} was deteccted modifying the ship's credits! ({Money})!

data.name: msg_FreeBuy_unlockable
data.value: {player} was detected buying a ship unlockable for free!

data.name: msg_game_start
data.value: <color=green>Anti-Cheat (v{ver}) is enabled in this lobby</color>

data.name: msg_Gift
data.value: {player} was detected causing a gift box to behave abnormally!

data.name: msg_GrabObject
data.value: {player} was detected grabbing objects from too far away! (Player coordinates: {player_position}|Item coordinates: {object_position})

data.name: msg_InfiniteAmmo
data.value: {player} was detected using infinite ammo!

data.name: msg_Invisibility
data.value: {player} was detected to be invisible! (Player coordinates: {player_position})

data.name: msg_ItemCooldown
data.value: {player} was detected using an item faster than its cooldown would allow!

data.name: msg_Jetpack
data.value: {player} was detected forcing a jetpack explosion!

data.name: msg_Kick
data.value: {player} was kicked!

data.name: msg_KillEnemy
data.value: {player} was detected killing a monster instantly! ({enemyName}, monster HP before: {HP})

data.name: msg_Landmine
data.value: {player} was detected forcing a landmine explosion!

data.name: msg_Map
data.value: {player} was detected to have a mini-map mod!

data.name: msg_Mask
data.value: {player} was detected to have spawned Masked enemies abnormally!

data.name: msg_Nameless
data.value: {player} was detected to have an anomalous or invalid name!

data.name: msg_RemoteTerminal
data.value: {player} was detected using the terminal remotely!

data.name: msg_ShipBuild
data.value: {player} was detected placing furniture in an abnormal position! ({position})

data.name: msg_ShipConfig2
data.value: {player}, please wait until the number of people in the ship has reached {cfg} or more before pulling the lever, thanks!

data.name: msg_ShipConfig4
data.value: {player}, please wait until the number of people in the ship has reached {player_count}({cfg4}%) and the time has reached {cfg3} to depart. (current time: {game_time})

data.name: msg_ShipConfig5
data.value: {player} was detected attempting to force the ship's lever!

data.name: msg_ShipLight
data.value: {player} was detected switching the lights too fast.

data.name: msg_ShipTerminal
data.value: {player} was detected making too much terminal noise!

data.name: msg_Shovel
data.value: {player} was detected dealing abnormal damage to {player2} with a shovel! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_Shovel2
data.value: {player} was detected with abnormal shovel range, and damaged {player2}! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_Shovel3
data.value: {player} was detected damaging {player2} with no weapon! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_Shovel4
data.value: {player} was detected dealing abnormal damage to {enemyName} with a shovel! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_Shovel5
data.value: {player} was detected with abnormal shovel range, and damaged {enemyName}! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_Shovel6
data.value: {player} was detected damaging [enemyName} with no weapon! ({damageAmount})

data.name: msg_snc_player
data.value: <color=yellow>[{player}] <color=green>New creature data sent to terminal! </color></color>

data.name: msg_Turret
data.value: {player} was detected causing a turret to go berserk! (distance: {Distance})

data.name: msg_Turret2
data.value: {player} was detected causing a turret to go berserk without a weapon!

data.name: msg_vote
data.value: You are the host, your vote can force the autopilot.

data.name: msg_vote_player
data.value: {player} Vote for the ship to leave early.({now}/{max})

data.name: msg_wlc_player
data.value: <color=green><color=yellow>[{player}]</color> joined the ship.</color>

data.name: Prefix
data.value: [AntiCheat]
